aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a British full-stack developer, teacher and mentor. I love creating innovative web solutions, helping people learn to code and sharing my knowledge with others. Based in Kristiansand, Norway, I blend technical expertise with a creative approach to problem-solving. I have extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development, specializing in building responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern frameworks and tools. My technical background allows me to tackle complex challenges across the entire development stack. I'm currently open to new opportunities within Norway, the EU, and the UK. I am passionate about teaching and mentoring, and I enjoy sharing my knowledge with others. I have experience in leading workshops, giving talks, and mentoring junior developers.

expertise.heading: My Expertise
expertise.description: Are you in need of a pragmatic enthusiast to drive your project forward? Fluent in the languages of engineering and aesthetics, I'm uniquely equipped to chart a couse for a practical product that prioritizes the customer's experience. My forte is full-stack development and devops engineering, and I'm committed to choosing the most fitting tools for each project, whether it's a robust framework or the latest web innovations. I understand that the key lies not only in impressive interfaces and blazing performance but also in striking a harmonious balance between sustainable implementation and user-centric functionality. Let's collaborate to bring your project to life.

tech.description: These are just some of the technologies I am familiar with.

projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each represents a unique challenge and learning experience.

projectOne.title: Portfolio Website
projectOne.description: A responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring GSAP animations and multi-language support.

projectTwo.title: E-commerce Platform
projectTwo.description: A full-featured online store with user authentication, product management, and payment processing.

projectThree.title: Mobile App
projectThree.description: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native for both iOS and Android devices.
